name: Templum Vitae
description:
Explore long lost ancient ruins in this first-person puzzle adventure!

CONTROLS:

  • WASD: Move
  •  Left Click: Pick up/Put down
  •  Q/E: Rotate Object
  •  Spacebar: Jump
  •  ESC/P: Pause Menu

***DISCLAIMERS***

This is a high-functioning Prototype built by one designer. Any issues, please comment and let me know! 

***CREDITS***

  • Music: Chris Zabriskie - The Temperature of the Air on the Bow of the Kaleetan (Jan, 2012)
  • Art: All art assets are free from Quixel Bridge and Infinity Blade
